products.name: Rice Krispies
products.description: Delicious corn-based rice grains melted together with marshmallows into a square-like shape.

products.name: Flamin Hot Cheetos
products.description: No one knows what's in the powder that covers these snacks, but wow is it amazing!

products.name: Cinnamon Rolls
products.description: Basically just cake for breakfast, but who's complaining?

products.name: Coconut Water
products.description: Somehow incredibly hydrating, while also not really being water.

products.name: Fruit Medley
products.description: More fruit than you know what to do with!

products.name: Bar Code Shirts
products.description: So you can scan yourself in the checkout aisle.

products.name: Striped Socks
products.description: Because the dryer ate most of your socks and it never hurts to have another clean pair.

products.name: Knitted Beanie
products.description: Keeps your head absurdly warm while the rest of your body freezes.

products.name: Pullover Sweater
products.description: At $4.99, can you really afford NOT to buy this?

products.name: Alpaca Wool Scarf
products.description: Legends say that the Alpaca knitted this scarf from its own fur.

products.name: Matching Rings
products.description: Ball out and get one for each finger!

products.name: Apple Watch
products.description: Why check your phone all the time when you can check your watch all the time?

products.name: Copper Bracelet
products.description: Compliment this accessory with a batter and some wire and you have yourself a portable charger right on your wrist!

products.name: Keyboard
products.description: A wireless keyboard for your computer! Because who doesn't like walking around while they type up an essay.

products.name: Mouse from 1998
products.description: Check out this fancy Microsoft mouse that was in use right before the dot com bubble crash of the 2000s! It's a collectors' item that still works great. Brings back that 'on the verge of the world collapsing' feeling.

products.name: Smart Glasses
products.description: Have the internet mounted to your face, and get the added benefit of looking silly all the time!
